name: A Tale Of Two Hearts
description:
Game Is Best Experienced in Full Screen!

A simple puzzle game where you need to get 2 hearts together! Pressing the arrow keys will move a heart, but it will move the other heart in the opposite direction.  If you make a mistake, press R to go restart, and press B to return to the main menu. The game is in first version, so there might be some bugs. If you see any bugs, please leave a comment or message me about it.
